name: Ultimate Warfare
description:
With limited bullets, and a strong enemy military assault, find yourself facing the most challenging war scenarios in this epic battle for victory. Use your limited ammunition very carefully and take accurate aims to complete the missions. Shoot down your enemy before they attack you

FEATURES:
• Amazing 3D Graphics for a realistic, epic battle
• Deadly ammunition for you to end the military assault
• Smooth game control to help you target your enemy
• Realistic combat action to keep you engrossed
• Intense battle environment that won’t let you put your phone down!
